key.name: dock-bar-style
key.description: Sets the style of minimized items in the dock bar. Refer to the GdlDockBarStyle enumeration in the GDL documentation.

key.name: toolbar-style
key.description: Sets the style of buttons in the toolbars. Refer to the GtkToolbarStyle enumeration in the GTK+ documentation. A negative value will use the user default toolbar preference.
